Method Summary
protected  void setUp()
           
protected  void tearDown()
           
 void testAcceptProxies()
          Test that the CASFilter will handle mutliple authorized proxies.
 void testAcceptProxy()
          Test that the CASFilter will accept a prior CASReceipt indicating the authorized proxy.
 void testAlreadyAuthenticated()
          Test that the CASFilter passes the request along the filter chain when the session already includes record of authentication.
 void testBasicInit()
          Test that the filter completes basic initialization without incident.
 void testGateway()
          Test that when gateway is true, requests simulating the redirect back from CAS with no ticket are passed through the chain.
 void testGetRemoteUser()
          Test that the CASFilter wraps the request to implement getRemoteUser() when configured to do so.
 void testInitGatewayAndRenew()
          Test that setting both gateway and renew results in servlet exception at initialization.
 void testInsecureProxier()
          Test that setting an insecure proxier fails at filter initialization.
 void testInsecureValidateUrl()
          Test that insecure validate URL results in servlet exception at initialization.
 void testNoServerNameNoServiceUrl()
          Test that initialization fails when neither the server name nor the service URL are specified.
 void testNotRemoteUser()
          Test that the CASFilter does not wrap the request to implement getRemoteUser() when it is not configured to do so.
 void testNoValidateUrl()
          Test that failing to set a validation URL results in servlet exception at initialization.
 void testRedirect()
          Test that the filter will redirect to the CAS Login URL.
 void testServiceAndServerName()
          Test that the Filter fails to initialize when both serverName and serviceUrl are set, as these parameters are mutually exclusive.
 void testStrictnessRejectProxied()
          Test that the CASFilter will not accept a prior CASReceipt that does not meet its requirement that the authentication not be proxied.
 void testStrictnessRejectUnknownProxy()
          Test that the CASFilter will not accept a prior CASReceipt that declares a proxying service that is not among the authorized proxies.
 void testStrictnessRequireRenew()
          Test that the CASFilter will not accept a prior CASReceipt that does not meet its requirement that the authentication be from a presentation of primary credentials -- that is, with renew=true on the validation request.

testStrictnessRequireRenew

public void testStrictnessRequireRenew()
                                throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                       java.io.IOException
Test that the CASFilter will not accept a prior CASReceipt that does not meet its requirement that the authentication be from a presentation of primary credentials -- that is, with renew=true on the validation request.

Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException
java.io.IOException
